about_the_game:
Kill or run away, and the last survivor is the winner! According to the talent of their choice, in the game to find equipment, the combination of the most appropriate equipment effect. When the fighting power is strong, chase other players, kill people to improve the fighting power! When the battle is weak, gather strength, wait for the moment when the strong enemy is weak, and give a lethal blow!

Talent Introduction

PAWN LEVEL 1
BLOODRAGE--------On a kill,regains 5 health
SEARCH--------Search equipment time -1s
EXP--------Damage to the enemy, 10% chance +1 power (Max 5)
STRENGTHEN--------Upgraded equipment, 20% chance +1 power (Max 5)

PAWN LEVEL 2
PERCEPTION--------On a kill,Get a unit
DUEL--------When there is only one enemy, +3 power

PAWN LEVEL 3
RANSACKING--------On a kill,gains 1 power（max 5）

ROOK ALL LEVEL
TRACK--------Show the player who recently hurt me on the map.
EYESUGHT--------Show the least healthy player on the map.
CRUELTY--------When someone dies,Found the enemy +20 (max 100)

KNIGHT ALL LEVEL
MISLEAD--------If there is a third player on the current map, I won't be found.
MADNESS--------When a player dies,+1 power,-1 Armor(max:5)

BIGSHOP ALL LEVEL
STRENGTH--------Basic power +3.[Everyone will see you!]
INTIMIDATE--------For every enemy that dies, +1 power (Max 5).[Everyone will see you!]

QUEEN ALL LEVEL
MUTATION--------When the enemy is even, +3 power. If it's odd, -3 power.
VIRUSES--------When you die, do 5 damage to the person who killed you.[Everyone will see you!]

KING ALL LEVEL
DESTROY--------Damage to the enemy, 20% chance to destroy one of the equipment in the enemy's bench
ESCAPE--------Show no player areas on the map.

DEATH ALL LEVEL
EXPOSE--------Open all player locations until death




SURVIVES--------When someone dies,regains 2 health
SEARCH--------Search equipment time -1s
EXP--------Attacking the enemy and causing damage, 20% chance +1 power (Max 5)

STRENGTHEN--------Basic power +3.[Everyone will see you!]
INTIMIDATE--------For every enemy that dies, +1 power (Max 5).[Everyone will see you!]
MUTATION--------When the enemy is even, +3 power. If it's odd, -3 power.
VIRUSES--------When you die, do 5 damage to the person who killed you.[Everyone will see you!]
DESTROY--------When dealing damage to an enemy, it has a 20% chance to destroy one of the equipment in the enemy's bench
ESCAPE--------Show no player areas on the map.
EXPOSE--------Open all player locations until death
detailed_description:
Kill or run away, and the last survivor is the winner! According to the talent of their choice, in the game to find equipment, the combination of the most appropriate equipment effect. When the fighting power is strong, chase other players, kill people to improve the fighting power! When the battle is weak, gather strength, wait for the moment when the strong enemy is weak, and give a lethal blow!

name: Auto Battle Royale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3 / Windows Vista / Windows 7
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3 / Windows Vista / Windows 7
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Kill or run away, and the last survivor is the winner!
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support
